page.title: 19Acknowledgements I
page.content:
Grateful thanks are due to the following people, without whose assistance this project would not have been worthwhile:
{Michelle Barlow }("A Day at Temple Newsam");{Sharon Newport & Lisa Morris ("Knostrop Lane" and "Fishpond Lock"); {Janette Kay}("By Skelton Grange"); {Wayne Robinson}("Typical Industrial Scenery");{Alan Gale & Gary Wilson ("Rothwell Moto-Cross Track"); {Chris Askham}("Rothwell Haigh"); {Amanda Thewlis}("The Edge of the Area");{Vicky Croasdale}("Skelton Grange Power Station");{Mr Alan Upton ("John O'Gaunts");{Mr Dave Westwell ("Pontefract Road");{Mr Peter Goakes ("Gazeteer", "How the Sewage Works", "Yorkshire Imperial" and "Stourton: a Dying Community"). (to be continued)
